entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 1 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
